resources.string:
Hi, my name is Hardeep Singh. 

I love coding. 

I am very massive fan of Google Company. 
Google company products are very reliable and high efficiency. 

I am using android studio product from last 2 years. 
And now i code in kotlin. 
And daily i learn so many things from android developer site. 

Android community is also very strong and i watch all it's videos in youtube. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own android application. 
You should ask someone else about android applications, though.
